text: wahdhru -ayha alnas- ywmana turjaeun fih 'iilaa allh, wahu yawm alqyamt, hayth tueradun ealaa allah lyhasbkm, fyjazy kl wahid minkum bima eamal min khayr 'aw sharun dun 'an yanaluh zlm. wafi alayat 'iisharatan 'iilaa 'ana ajtnab ma haram allah min almakasib alrbwyt, tkmyl lil'iiman whqwqh min 'iqam alsalat wa'iita' alzakat waeamil alsalhat
